snippet.title: Jonathan Kozol
snippet.description: 'We are in a battle for the soul of U.S. education.' -- Jonathan Kozol The other night I had the opportunity to hear writer-educator-activist Jonathan Kozol speak to a packed house at my local university. For those of y...

snippet.description: Explorers introduce kids to diversity of marine life.

snippet.title: Pork So Good It Could Make You Cry

snippet.title: DVD Review: A Home at the End of the World
snippet.description: Great acting, but soap opera-ish. Not for kids.

snippet.title: Review: White Noise
snippet.description: Dumb would-be thriller -- save your money.
